Verb *talk*
************

Documentation for the talk verb in */cmds/verbs/talk.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``talk``
 |  ``talk with <someone>``
 |  ``talk to <someone>``

 Talk to noone in particular, or to someone you have met.
